channel.title: Github on Riinu's scripting diary
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Riinu's scripting diary

item.title: Hello world: blogdown loves Hugo
item.description: We are live! I wrote my last blog post on Wordpress on 20-October 2017. I’ve been blogging on Wordpress since 2014 and the more I used the more painful it got! This is most likely caused by the fact that I have been thrifting further and further away from point-and-click interfaces…oh and discovering MARKDOWN. My two rules: text is written in Markdown (usually R Markdown/knitr/bookdown, e.g. see how easy it is to create a book: “HealthyR: the eBook”) data analysis needs to end up in a Shiny app (e.
